definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: The increased WOB is not good for deviation control.
sentences.chinese: 當轉速一定時，提高鑽壓不利於防斜打直。
